name: King Of The Box
description:
A small game made for the 2022 GamePlusJam. It's about a small toy tank fighting 3 waves of enemy tanks for control of the toy box. The game is currently very small due to time constraints but at least it's playable.

This game was made by me, also it's my first game made for a game jam.

Credits: 

- Kennys for thee blaster kit and weapons pack

- Nokobot for the muzzle flash effect

- Unity for the tank model

- More...
